Constructs an new Debug class and attaches it to the log object.
Set the formatter for the output. The HTML formatter is set by default.
Get the formatted output.
Stop the timer @param $name Need to supply a name only when multiple timers are running.
Forward the messages to the log.

Subtract the parameters and message from an trigger_error message. The format of a trigger_error message is either: "[ function, source, category ] message" or "[ source, category ] message" Function can be: START_TIMER, STOP_TIMER, and FATAL. Source: Paynet for example. category: Category for Warnings and Errors. But is a group for timers. @param string $str @return array Returns an array with two elements. First element is an array with parameters. The second element contains the message. So the structure is as follows: array( array( param1, param2, param3), message)
